briefTitle: ERADICATE Hp - Treating Helicobacter Pylori With RHB-105
officialTitle: A Randomized Placebo-Controlled Phase 3 Study to Assess the Safety and Efficacy of RHB-105 in the Treatment of Confirmed Helicobacter Pylori (H. Pylori) Infection in Non-investigated Dyspepsia Patients
summary: The "test and treat" strategy for treating dyspeptic patients who are H. pylori positive is rapidly becoming the standard of care. This study will test the effectiveness of RHB-105, a new triple therapy to treat H. pylori infection in dyspeptic patients.

primaryOutcome.measure: The Occurrence of H. Pylori Eradication as Confirmed Via 13C UBT Testing
